Article.ArticleTitle: The family physician's role in long COVID management.

Abstract.AbstractText: A paucity of both data and therapeutics presents obstacles to care and makes your role in symptom management, psychological support, and referral-all described here-essential.

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: Department of Public Health Sciences (Dr. Mayo), Department of Family Medicine (Drs.
